item.description:
Oceanside cuisine: Great, fresh seafood in a very casual atmosphere. Fried, steamed, baked, broiled, pasta'd and souped. Just like your favorite seafood shack at the shore, order and pay at the counter in the DINING ROOM (door to the left as you walk in), find a seat and when they call your number raise your hand and it's brought to the table. Cash, Mastercard or Visa.

They serve beer and wine, have a large salt water fish tank and the wait staff is very nice! Small open dining room - easy to find us and we can push tables together in any formation. Ahoy mates, bring your appetite!

The restaurant is at the end of the strip of businesses behind O'porto Restaurant. Parking lot entrance is next to the big 7-11 sign on Park Street, or off Prospect Ave near the intersection.

A couple of reviews can be found here http://hartford.citys...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: TINKER'S SEAFOOD ON 04/09/08
